lead_paragraph: An “organ preservation vehicle” could save lives, but conflicts with the need for law enforcement officials to preserve bodies, with organs intact, for investigations.
snippet: An “organ preservation vehicle” could save lives, but conflicts with the need for law enforcement officials to preserve bodies, with organs intact, for investigations.

headline.main: A Plan to Recover More Organs for Transplant Runs Into Difficulty
headline.seo: A Plan to Recover More Organs for Transplant Runs Into Difficulty
